title: Remove the rule "lock in" in champion select.
body: Me and my friend have been in queues for 5 minutes max, but been in champion select for around 10 minutes until someone forgets to lock in and wastes everyone's time, it is a stupid rule and RIOT need to change it. its wasting time and it is annoying when someone doesn't lock in.

replies.body:
Hint if people are forced to lock in, they will eventually cause champion selects to go faster because people will learn to lock in before they alt-tab to do things.

Which will be better considering this Champion select method takes longer.
